constituent: officer, history, length, stick, one, mouth, tucked under the arm
heisigStory: One . . . mouth . . . tucked under the arm.
koohiiStory1: One officer can change the course of history.
koohiiStory2: One officer, namely Napoleon, changed the course of history. (Thanks, ayoung24). Napoleon is also my primitive meaning.
myStory: chức năng. nhân viên văn phòng. một miệng dưới tay
